246244.en:
Welcome, Mr. Servant. I am Jirgamot, the head of the bazaar. Yushka told me. Yushka told me that he ordered you
to solve the bazaar's problems. That's refreshingly circular. However, I also expect you to cooperate willingly, and
not just because I'm ordering you to. Of course, I'm prepared to pay you handsomely for your help. How's that?
Will you help us with our bazaar?

246245.en:
I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Shimobe-san, please accept my regards. As I told you before, the bazaar is
running out of goods because the traders carrying goods from the Dinga Trade Post are being attacked by
monsters in Zumul Pass. Monsters keep appearing one after another, and since we can't rely on the military, it's
more practical to open up another trade route. We need to use the Dinga Barrier near the Dinga Trade Post to
allow safe passage for our traders. But there is a slight problem with that barrier.There is an
archaeologist, Mapricot, who is looking into it, and I was wondering if you could go there and talk to him.
It's northeast of Farazard. If you have any questions, just ask. Work hard, servant.

I'm so glad to hear from you. Since you're like that, you must have your hands full with requests right now.
Can you come back after you finish your other business? But as soon as possible.

246247.en:
Oh, hey. What can I do for you? I
won't let you down this far. Please
come back as soon as possible.

246248.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most free and vibrant desert fortress in the Demon World. The Dinga Barrier is
located northeast of Farazard in the Jyarimbaha Desert. Look carefully at the map and walk accordingly.

246249.en:
If we can use the Dinga Barrier to allow safe passage for our merchants, we can solve the shortage of goods in
the bazaar.

246250.en:
There's just a little problem with the barrier. The archaeologist, Mapricot, is doing some research on it, and I
was wondering if you could go there and talk to him. It's northeast of Farazard.If you have any questions
about where to go, just ask me. Work hard, servant.

246251.en:
Nihihi! We specialize in witchcraft. Who do you want to curse? Who would you like to ruin? How about your heart
for the price? No? No? Did you come here on the recommendation of Mapricot? No, I'm not. Such a pain in
the ass, huh? Okay, okay! I'm afraid of what'll happen later, so I'll cooperate. I've heard about the
sealing of the barrier, but I've never heard that it's from the Zardoz era. But even I, a rare sorcerer, don't
know what to do if I don't find out the identity of the sorcery sealing the barrier. Farazard is a country
that united a group of small states in the desert, built on the site of the former shipping city of Zard. I'm sure
there must be at least one survivor who knows what it was like back then. I'm sure there's a lot of information
out there! Why don't you ask a Water- type monster? Hee hee hee!

246252.en:
Mapricot's research suggests that the Dinga Barrier may have something to do with sorcery. That would certainly be
where Neshalot comes in.

246253.en:
Neshalot has a magic shop west of
Farazard.<bw_break>

246254.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246255.en:
Hot crab, hot crab.Hot crab, hot crab. Crab that's almost dried up to the tips of its scissors. Are you a crab
looking for survivors of the zard? Me, I'm a migratory crab, moving from one desert to the next. I don't think he's
gonna live that long.

246256.en:
Long before Farazard was built, this area was a thriving historic shipping town, but it was destroyed in the war.
The town was devastated, and the thief settled in the town, but when Farazard was built, most of the thiefs were
wiped out by our Demon King. Even now, the surviving thiefs are still trying to take revenge against the Demon
King. I think their name is Shish Kebab. So, you think I'm not a survivor of the defunct shipping city
of Zard? No, no. I am just a well- informed person.

246257.en:
Even I, a rare sorcerer, don't know what to do until I find out what the sorcery is that's sealing off the
customs. Farazard is a country that united a group of small states in the desert, built on the site of the
former shipping city of Zard. I'm sure there must be at least one survivor who knows what it was like back then.
I'm sure you can get some information from there first!Why don't you ask a water-type monster? Hee hee hee!

246258.en:
<pc> was taken into the
building and laid face down on a
moderately hard bed in the dark.

246259.en:
was sent to the paradise by Eusty's exquisite touch and service talk! The fatigue of the trip was
relieved and I feel lightened! All of 's HP was restored!

246262.en:
Yurayura.I may look like this, but I am a stimulating masseuse. You can choose the level of numbness from weak
to strong. The weakest is a subtle touch that sends you to paradise.The strongest one is a very serious one
and will send you to the paradise. But I'm not used to seeing you here, so why don't you take advantage of my
free first-time service that includes my talk as a bonus?

246263.en:
Sorry to hear that. I look forward to
seeing you again.

246264.en:
Yurayura kashikomi-yo. Newcomers, one
person to show you around.

246265.en:
Fluttering. You're really good at this, customer! Are you an adventurer? Sealing the barrier? Yes. That's right. Yes~ Good job, good job, good job. I know a little bit about Zard. My ancestors are the
survivors of the defunct Zard. It is said that in the past, Zard was the place where the best merchants gathered and amassed their wealth even
across the rough and stormy Demon Sea. It was even called the Utopia of the Demon World. But the Demon King who
ruled Zard was greedy. He was so greedy that he took most of the wealth for himself and held a grudge. It was at this time that the massive salt damage occurred. When salt damage occurs, buildings tend to collapse.
Crops would have been completely wiped out. But the Demon King didn't save the starving people. This was the
first movement of destruction. Oh, well, time's almost up. Let me finish up!

I'm sure he knows a lot more about what Zard just said. I'll talk to him later. I'm glad you're feeling a
little better. I'm rooting for you, my customers, who are doing your best for Farazard.

246267.en:

looking for a water-type monster.<open_irai><bw_break>

246268.en:
I wonder if he was around the plaza? Also, Eusty, who runs a massage parlor in the bazaar, is a Water-type Man o'

246270.en:
Long before Farazard was built, this area was a thriving historic shipping town, but it was destroyed in the war.
The town was devastated, and the thief settled in the town, but when Farazard was built, most of the thiefs were
wiped out by our Demon King. Even now, the surviving thiefs are still trying to take revenge against the Demon
King. I think their name is Shish Kebab.

246271.en:
Even I, a rare sorcerer, don't know what to do until I find out what the sorcery is that's sealing off the
customs. Farazard is a country that united a group of small states in the desert, built on the site of the
former shipping city of Zard. That means... there must be at least one survivor who knows what happened back
then. Go gather information from there first!

246272.en:
received and ate a skewer of blackened, dubious looking kushiyaki from Mohabi. Despite its
appearance, it was surprisingly tasty! 's eyes started to water! All of 's MP has been restored!

246275.en:
Oh, welcome, little guy. I'd love to feed you with my cooking, but unfortunately we're closed due to the
lack of supplies. I thought you came here to eat.You're looking into Zard, the shipping city! My great-
grandfather told me about it. The salt damage that hit Zard killed a lot of people, but the greedy Demon King was
so busy protecting his own property that he finally revolted and was killed by his own people. Finally, the
people revolted and killed him, and the next thing you know, the heirarchy started.The Demon King had three sons,
and the first and second princes, who were proud of their power, began to kill each other, and in the end, they
fell together in a heap. The survivors abandoned the devastated Zard and scattered to the wilderness. It's a
shameful story, isn't it? Farazard is no stranger to this. If the shortage continues, there will be a war over
food. You know what? The fate of our country depends on your work, little guy. Now eat this! No, but eat it! If
you don't eat it, you'll be in trouble!

246276.en:
Ha-ha-ha. Yum, right?Farazard's famous Demon World black lizard skewers! It used to be my treat, but I'll make an
exception and give it to you! Well, the third prince who didn't join the heirarchy, took Zard's treasure and
ran away in the dead of night. Scattering across the desert. The thief who chased after the treasure is
still alive. Hajaraha, the boss of the alleyway in Farazard, is rumored to be so.

246277.en:
Zard was once the Utopia of Demon World. But the Demon King who ruled Zard was greedy. He was the sole owner
of most of the wealth, and he held a grudge. That's when the salt floods hit. And yet the Demon King did not
save his starving people. This was the first movement of their doom. I'm sure the restaurant next to mine knows this
story well. I'll ask them.

246278.en:
Neshalot told me to look for survivors in the shipping city of Zard, and Eusty introduced me to a restaurant in
the bazaar.

246279.en:
If you're looking for a restaurant in the bazaar, the tent is right there. Mr. Mohabi is wielding his skill. He
may look scary, but he's a nice guy.

246280.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246281.en:
The third prince, the Demon King of Zard, did not join the heirarchy and fled with Zard's treasures in a last-
ditch effort. Scattered across the desert. The thief who chased after the treasure is still alive. Hajaraha, the
boss of alleyway, is rumored to be the one.

246282.en:
Zard was once the Utopia of Demon World. But the Demon King who ruled Zard was greedy. He was the sole owner
of most of the wealth, and he held a grudge. That's when the salt floods hit. And yet the Demon King did not
save his starving people. This was the first movement of their doom. Was my story helpful? I'm rooting for our
customers who are doing their best for Farazard.

246283.en:
Neshalot told me to look for survivors
in the shipping city of Zard, and I
heard rumors of Hajaraha from Mohabi.<open_irai><bw_break>

246284.en:
Hajaraha should be somewhere on the alleyway at the southeast end of the city, but it's dangerous and you have
to be very careful when walking down the street.

246285.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246286.en:
Welcome to Farazard Jewelry Shop. Here, we do everything from sorting ores to processing them into jewelry
and ornaments. Ores that have been exposed to demon miasma are endowed with magical powers. The higher
ranking demons pay a heavy price for special gems and jewelry. Now, what can I do for you?

246287.en:
Oh! That's very exciting!The Treasure of the Evil Seal is another maniacal item. It is said to be a legendary
item in which the souls of 100 evil spirits of hell were sealed according to the taste of a certain Demon King.
It is said that the ore gefendaite, which has the power to seal evil spirits, was condensed by witchcraft
to produce this treasure. If you tell Neshalot what you just heard, I'm sure he'll come up with a way to deal with
it. He may not look it, but he is a first-rate sorcerer.

246288.en:
<pc> explained to Halley
about the Dinga Barrier and the Evil
Seal Jade!

246289.en:
The third prince, the Demon King of Zard, did not join the heirarchy and fled with Zard's treasures in a last-
ditch effort to escape. Scattered across the desert. And many thieves chased after them. Heh heh heh, so
Hajaraha was the last survivor of the chief. Damn, he's like a living legend!

246290.en:
Neshalot told me to look for survivors in the maritime city of Zard, and I was able to get Hajaraha to tell me
about the customs house.

246291.en:
So, I told him that I was going to go to the Jewelry Shop in the Market Area next. It's near the entrance to the
east alleyway on Farazard.

246292.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246293.en:
The Evil Sealing Jewel is a legendary item in which the souls of 100 evil spirits of hell were sealed by a
certain Demon King. It is said that it was created by condensing the ore gefendaite, which has the power to
seal away evil spirits, through witchcraft. If you tell Neshalot what you just heard, I'm sure he'll come up
with a way to deal with it. He may not look it, but he's a first-rate sorcerer.
246293.ja:

246294.en:
Nihihi! Welcome back~. So. Did you
find any survivors of Zard? What kind
of sorcery is sealing the barrier?

246295.en:
Hmmm. Dinga Barrier has been shut down by the evil spirits that emerged from the Evil Seal Jade. If only we could
get the 100 evil spirits from hell that reside in the barrier back into the Dinga Jade, but the Dinga Jade has
already been shattered. Alright, I'll do it! I'll make a new spell to replace the Evil Sealer's Jewel. I'll
absorb the souls of the evil spirits into it. I'll use GeFendaite as the material for the spell. Halley told me
how to get it before. There is a monster called <%sev_que_name0> that lives in the southwest of Jyarimbaha
Desert and it has a habit of collecting Gefendrites. Go collect 100 of them! Yeah. 100, with your ears all
lined up. Hee hee hee! You don't have to be so scared, you can manage somehow. Gogo!

246296.en:
<pc> gave all the information
he had gathered so far on Farazard!

246297.en:
Halley at the Jewelry Shop told me a
lot about the Evil Seal Jade. I guess
you can count on the experts.<open_irai><bw_break>

246298.en:
We should immediately inform Neshalot
and ask him to come up with a plan to
open the gate.<bw_break>

246299.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246300.en:
The Evil Sealing Jewel is a legendary item in which the souls of 100 evil spirits of hell were sealed by a
certain Demon King. It is said to have been created by condensing the ore Geffendaite, which has the power to
seal away evil spirits, through witchcraft.

246301.en:
I'll make you a new spellbook to replace the Evil Seal Jewel. I'll use the Gefrendite to make the spellbook.
A monster called <%sev_que_name0> that lives in the southwestern part of the Jyarimbaha Desert has the habit of
collecting Gefendrites. Go collect 100 of them! Don't look so bad... you'll manage somehow. Gogo!

246302.en:
The Dinga Barrier was once sealed by a treasure called the Treasure of the Evil Seal. But it looks like we can
create a replacement.

246303.en:
Once you have defeated <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and collected your GeFendait, give it to Neshalot to have
him make you a spell tool.

246304.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246305.en:
Nihihi! Good night! Did you get the
GeFenda ito? A hundred. 100, with your
ears all lined up!

246306.en:
I guess you can't make 100? I'm all
set for this one, though.

246307.en:
Oh, wow! Indeed, I got 100 pieces! You're pretty talented, aren't you? I'm tempted to make you my exclusive
Famililar nihihihihihihihi! I'll leave the rest to you. Even the Demon King bows down to this rare sorcerer
Neshalot-sama! Oh! I'll turn off the lights for a moment. Because amateurs have strong shigeki.
Nihihihihihihihihihi.

246308.en:
A hundred souls of blood, immortal mukuro, bind them. Fill the empty vessel with its fat. Mubara Lueb Ciara
Grabosra

246309.en:
Ta-da! Completed with pride! This is
the Evil Sealing Lamp that unseals the
barrier!

246310.en:
The evil seal jewel is too much for an ordinary demon to handle, so I arranged it into an oil lamp for you
to use as well. I'm so kind~ Eh? How to use the Evil Sealing Lamp? How do you use the Evil Sealing Lamp? You
just do a ''Tachi-Tachi-Pit-Turn'' and then a ''Zum-Tachi-Pit-Turn'' and then a ''Gumo-Gumo-Gumo-Gumo''! Then,
''Tabachoa! And finally, Yoi kolyak! That's it. Hee hee hee! Okay, I'll take care of the rest. Take the lamp
and go back to Mapricot at the Dinga Barrier!

246311.en:
Would you give Gefendite Sack to
Neshalot?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

246313.en:
When Neshalot turned off the lights, in the darkness, there was a sickening sound like meat being dragged, and a
foul smell lingered around the area.

246315.en:
The Dinga Barrier was once sealed by a treasure called the Evil Sealer's Treasure, but it looks like you can
make a replacement spell tool.

246316.en:
Since we seem to have gathered enough gefendait, let's immediately ask Neshalot to make a spell to unseal the
barrier.

246317.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246318.en:
What? You want to hear how to use the Evil Sealing Lamp again? That's because, when you do the ''Tachi-Tachi-
Pit-Turn'' and ''Zum-Tachi-Zum-Tachi- Zum'', you get the ''Gumo-Mo''! Then, ''Tabachoa! And finally, Yoi kolyar!
That's it. Hee hee hee! I'll take care of the rest. Take the lamp and go back to Mapricot at the Dinga Barrier!

246319.en:
You had Neshalot make an Evil Sealing
Lamp to unseal the barrier. That's
her, isn't it?<open_irai><bw_break>

246320.en:
Then Mapricot should be waiting for us
at the Dinga Barrier, can you deliver
it to her?<bw_break>

246321.en:
<close_irai>I believe you will save our precious
bazaar. You work hard, servant.

246322.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most free and vibrant desert nocturnal castle in the Demon World. I hear
you've been very successful! Thanks to you, for the first time in a long time, a troop of merchants from Dinga
Trade Post is coming here!
246322.ja:

246323.en:
Niiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii iiiiiiiiiiiiiiii! Hey ! Did you get the Evil Sealing Lamp to
work properly? Tachitachi, pit-turn, zum-tach, gyu-moh...! Then, ''Tabachoa''! And finally, Yoi kolyar!
Speaking of magic lamps, this is the o ne...nihihihihihihihihihihihihihihihih ihihihihihihihihihihihihihihihihihihi!
246323.ja:

246324.en:
Welcome back, Mr. Servome. You worked with Mapricot and Neshalot to finally open the customs. Now that a safe
trade route has been secured, the traders will be arriving soon and the shortage should be solved. My sisters
did their best, but more than anyone else, it's because of you that the problem was solved so quickly. I love
valuable things. I'd pay any amount of money for a capable servant like you. Hey. How much would you be willing to
pay to be mine? I'm quite serious. Keep a positive attitude. And this is my reward.

246325.en:
We sisters used to rule a small kingdom at the end of the Jyarimbaha Desert. But the current Demon King of
Farazard has made an enthusiastic plea for us to help him create the most idealistic kingdom ever. I believe
that a sharp Demon King who can unite such diverse nations will build a true Demon World Utopia this time. But
there is one thing that concerns me. If it's all right with you, after we take a break, will you give us a call
again? In the meantime, thank you for your hard work, servant-san.
246325.ja:

246372.en:
Welcome, traveler! I don't know where you're from, but we welcome you no matter where you're from. If you're
here to see the sights, why don't you take a boat ride around Farazard Castle? It's free! You can also go to
the alleyway, but be prepared to get off at the alleyway.

246373.en:
Hot crab, hot crab. Crab that seems to
be getting chilled to the tips of its
scissors.

246374.en:
Farazard is surrounded by desert, but we've taken advantage of the oasis and opened up a rich plantation. Sorry, I
can't tell you where the farm is. Crops from the desert are so precious that they are hidden from thief's
eyes.
246374.ja:
ã€Œç ‚æ¼ ã«å›²ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã ãŒ ã€€ã‚ªã‚¢ã‚·ã‚¹ã‚’æ´»ã‹ã—ã¦ã€€é–‹æ‹“ã—ãŸ ã€€è±Šã‹ãªè¾²åœ’ã‚’ã€€æŒã£ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãœã„ã€‚
ã€ŒãŠã£ã¨ã€€æ‚ªã„ãŒã€€è¾²åœ’ã®å ´æ‰€ã¯è¨€ãˆãªã„ãœã„ã€‚ ã€€ç ‚æ¼ ã§ã¨ã‚Œã‚‹ä½œç‰©ã¯ã€€è²´é‡ã ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ç›—è³Šã«ç‹™ã‚ã‚Œãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã€€éš ã—ã¦ã‚ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãœã„ã€‚

246375.en:
Carpenters and craftsmen who work in Farazard gather here and live together. If you like it here, you're
welcome to stay.

246376.en:
I can't tell you the details, but I've been working on a great building at a secret location under the orders of
the Demon King. I've been working on it for a long time, but recently, it's finally being completed. I'm looking
forward to the day when I can unveil it.
246376.ja:
ã€Œãã‚ã—ãã¯è¨€ãˆãªã„ãŒ ã€€é­”ç‹æ§˜ã®å‘½ä»¤ã§ã€€ã¨ã‚ã‚‹ç§˜å¯†ã®å ´æ‰€ã« ã€€ç«‹æ´¾ãªå»ºç‰©ã‚’ã€€ä½œã£ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãœã€‚
ã€Œé•·ã„ã“ã¨ã€€ä½œæ¥­ã—ã¦ã‚‹ãŒ ã€€æœ€è¿‘ã€€ã‚ˆã†ã‚„ãã€€å®ŒæˆãŒè¦‹ãˆã¦ããŸã‚“ã ã€‚ ã€€ãŠæŠ«éœ²ç›®ã™ã‚‹æ—¥ãŒã€€æ¥½ã—ã¿ã ãªã‚ã€‚

246377.en:
Welcome to Farazard Jewelry Shop. Here, we do everything from ore selection to processing into jewelry
and ornaments. Of course, we also sell Accessory. But now is not a good time. When logistics reopen, will you come
back?

246378.en:
This is Farazard Castle. You can't enter without the Demon King's permission. If you want to see the
sights, you can spin around town.

246379.en:
It's a magic shop. The owner, Neshalot, calls himself a rare magician, but I wonder what he really
is.

246380.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most
free and vibrant desert nocturnal
castle in the Demon World.

246381.en:
Maou-sama is a kind person. He takes good care of children, even Farazard's treasure! He is also kind to cats.
There is an uncle cat in the back!

246382.en:
Hanya. My eyes are spinning with busyness. Too many receipts, invoices, pledges, contracts, and letters to
deliver!

246383.en:
The most important aspect of a gem's value is, of course, the quality of the magic it contains. But visual
beauty is also very important. A real jeweler is able to visualize a gemstone from the time it is still a
stone to how it will look after it has been processed into a piece of jewelry.
246383.ja:
ã€Œå®çŸ³ã®ä¾¡å€¤ã§ã€€æœ€é‡è¦è¦–ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã¯ ã€€ã‚‚ã¡ã‚ã‚“ã€€å†…åŒ…ã™ã‚‹é­”åŠ›ã®è³ªã ã‚ã€‚ ã€€ã§ã‚‚ã€€è¦‹ãŸç›®ã®ç¾ã—ã•ã‚‚ã€€ã¨ã¦ã‚‚å¤§äº‹ãªã®ã€‚
ã€Œå®çŸ³ãŒã€€ã¾ã ã€€çŸ³ã“ã‚ã®æ®µéšã‹ã‚‰ ã€€å®é£¾å“ã¨ã—ã¦åŠ å·¥ã—ãŸå¾Œã®ã€€å‡ºæ¥æ˜ ãˆã¾ã§ ã€€ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ãã¦ã“ãã€€æœ¬ç‰©ã®å®çŸ³å•†ã‚ˆã€‚

246384.en:
Yes, no, no, no, no. Don't you want a Farazard souvenir? Oh, a traveler like you has no business here. I sell only
children's toys. I can make toys out of whatever I can find around here, but not trade goods. I hope you can
solve the problem soon.

246385.en:
Farazard has easily accepted straggler monsters like me who left their hometown for some reason. There are a
lot of conflicts because of the mix- up, but every day is festive and fun.

246386.en:
Nihihi! We specialize in witchcraft. Who do you want to curse? Who would you like to ruin? How about your heart
for the price? That's what witchcraft is all about. If there is someone you want to curse even if you have to
offer your heart, come again~. Nihihihihihihihihihi!

246387.en:
Wine made from Farazard fruit is an important trade article. Of course, the taste is also the best in the
world! But they've been out of stock for a while now, and there's no word on when they'll be back in stock!

246388.en:
It feels good to sing in a plaza. Let's sing a song... La la la la la... Farazard is a good place... Come here
at least once... Shopping at the bazaar... But now... I'm in a bit of trouble...

246389.en:
Hello Hey, lady! Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good news.Hello , can you come by, miss? Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good
news.

246390.en:
The Demon King of Farazard grew his country through trade, bringing people and goods together. Sales from the
bazaar are especially important. The man who carries the weight and the trust is Jirgamot, the head of the
gang. He has a beautiful smile, but he's also very clever. By the way, he's a bazaarfly... I think if I tried
to hit on you over drinks, you'd probably go down first.

246391.en:
Every mineral in the Demon World contains magical power. That's why demons have been using gems to enhance
their abilities since ancient times. Our job is to find the veins before anyone else does, process the minerals
into valuable gems and jewelry, and deliver them to the appropriate demons.

246392.en:
I've got an order for a new Accessory,
but the price of jewelry is too high
for me to stock it. Oh, I'm so weak.

246393.en:
Ha! Phew! Ho! My passionate dance!
Watch me dance like a hole in the
wall!

246394.en:
My day job is patrolling commercial areas! Please make sure to walk on well-lit streets. Do not be caught in
an alleyway!

246395.en:
Hi, traveler. This is a relaxed country, but there are many pickpockets and looters. Hold your
baggage firmly with both hands.

246397.en:
Yushka got up before <pc> and
went out somewhere.<bw_break>

246398.en:
Let's go to Jirgamot's place and talk
to him to solve the problem that is
happening in bazaarl.

246399.en:
I've been making the rounds lately because there's been a lot of burglaries. The Farazard Army relies
on me, you know. I used to be a thief a little while ago, so I can tell which houses are easy to rob. Former
robbers are specialists in crime prevention.
246399.ja:

246400.en:
I came here to buy ingredients for my medicine, but the price just keeps going up day by day. When will they go
back to the original bazaar!

246401.en:
We are sorry, but due to some circumstances, we are unable to sell any items to you. Please come back
another day.

246402.en:
I can't leave the store because if I'm not careful, I get robbed. Especially since prices have gone up, the number
of victims has increased. I don't want to be suspicious, but I wonder if the alleyways are being robbed by people
who can't stand being poor!

246403.en:
We hired mercenaries to exterminate the monsters attacking the merchants, but to our surprise, none of them
returned. Maybe they were beaten, or maybe they ran away, either way, we don't have the strength to fight. Oh,
Yushka-sama, please do something.

246404.en:
Day after day, I get yelled at by customers, and my heart almost breaks. Demo demo demo~! If Yushka-sama is
here, I'll be brave! You too, lend me your strength, servant!

246405.en:
Oh, welcome, little guy. I'd love to feed you all my food, but unfortunately we're closed due to lack
of supplies. Damn those Zumul Pass monsters. I wish I could chop them up into little pieces and use them as
ingredients for my rice casserole! Food resentment is a terrible thing.
246405.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã†ã€€ã‚ˆãæ¥ãŸãªã€€ã¡ã£ã“ã„ã®ã€‚ ã€€ä¿ºã®æ–™ç†ã‚’ã€€ãŸã‚‰ãµãã€€é£Ÿã‚ã›ã¦ã‚„ã‚ŠãŸã„ãŒ ã€€ç‰©è³‡ãŒå±Šã‹ãªã„ã›ã„ã§ã€€ã‚ã„ã«ãé–‰åº—ä¸­ã ã€‚
ã€Œã¡ãã—ã‚‡ã†ã€€ã‚ºãƒ ã‚¦ãƒ«å³ ã®é­”ç‰©ã©ã‚‚ã‚â€¦â€¦ã€‚ ã€€ç´°ã‹ãåˆ»ã‚“ã§ã€€ãƒŠãƒ™ã®å…·æã«ã—ã¦ã‚„ã‚Šã¦ãˆãªã‚ï¼ ã€€é£Ÿã„ç‰©ã®æ¨ã¿ã¯ã€€ãŠãã‚ã—ã„ãã€‚

246406.en:
If goods are in short supply, prices will rise, and higher prices will lead to greater loss of customers. If this
happens, merchants will go out of business, and that will be the ultimate in sadness. Please help us
together with Mr. Yushka, Servants.

246407.en:
You are Yushka's servant. I am paid by Yushka-sama. Yushka-sama will be here soon. Shall I show you to your room
first?

246408.en:
I guess you still want to take a look
around Castle Town.Well then, give me
a call later.

246409.en: Yes, sir! Well then, follow me.

246410.en:
Yurayura. I may look like this, but I am a stimulating masseuse. You can choose the level of numbness from weak
to strong. The weakest is a subtle touch that sends you to paradise. The strongest one is a very strong touch
and will send you to the paradise.

246411.en:
This bazaar trades various goods coming from the Dinga Trade Post northeast of the Jyarimbaha Desert.
Recently, one after another, vicious monsters have appeared on the Zumul Pass, an important trade route, and
have been attacking the traders who carry the goods. We asked Farazard's army to take down the monsters, but
they have their own reasons, so we can't make any major moves. Yushka said so confidently that she'd leave
it to me, so I guess I can count on you, the servant, too, right?
246411.ja:

246412.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most free and vibrant desert nocturne in the Demon World. But right now, the
town is in a state of unrest due to a persistent shortage of goods. When is this going to be resolved?
246412.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ç ‚ã®éƒ½ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€‚ ã€€é­”ç•Œã§ã€€æœ€ã‚‚è‡ªç”±ã§ã€€æ´»æ°—ã«ã‚ãµã‚Œã‚‹ ã€€ç ‚æ¼ ã®ä¸å¤œåŸã ã€‚

246413.en:
Yushka-sama is out somewhere. You take
care, too. Well...<bw_break>

246414.en:
You came, Servome-san. Are you done
with your break?<yesno><break>

246415.en:
Oh, I heard you were very active. For the first time in a while, Dinga Trade Post's merchants are coming and going
in Farazard. Thanks to them, you can hear the sound of lively business transactions from all over the place.
This is Farazard as it should be! By the way, if you want to go boating, be my guest. You can go down the
alleyway, but be prepared to be a little more careful when you get off there.

246416.en:
Hot crab, hot crab.Hot crab, hot crab, crab that looks like it's going to get sunburned right down to the tips of
its scissors. The other day, Drake Slime, the crab that was wetting his pants here, was bragging about being a
leader of a thief group called Shish Kebab.
246416.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã£ã¤ã„ã‚«ãƒ‹ã€€ã‚ã£ã¤ã„ã‚«ãƒ‹ã€‚ ã€€ãƒã‚µãƒŸã®å…ˆã¾ã§ã€€ã²ã‹ã‚‰ã³ãã†ã‚«ãƒ‹â€¦â€¦ ã€€ã‚¢ãƒ³ã‚¿ã‚‚ã€€æ°´è¾ºã§ã€€ã†ã‚‹ãŠã£ã¦ãã‚«ãƒ‹ï¼Ÿ

246417.en:
Hey, it's you! Thank you for your help. Welcome to Farazard Jewelry Shop. Here at Farazard Jewelry Shop,
we do everything from ore sorting to gemstone and jewelry processing. Of course, we also sell Accessory. Our
knowledgeable and experienced jewelers will provide you with the best accessories.

246418.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most free and vibrant desert nocturne in the Demon World. The shortage of goods
that has plagued you for so long has been eliminated! Shop to your heart's content, play and play and rest your
body to your heart's content.
246418.ja:
ã€Œã“ã“ã¯ã€€ç ‚ã®éƒ½ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã€‚ ã€€é­”ç•Œã§ã€€æœ€ã‚‚è‡ªç”±ã§ã€€æ´»æ°—ã«ã‚ãµã‚Œã‚‹ ã€€ç ‚æ¼ ã®ä¸å¤œåŸã ã€‚
ã€Œæ‚©ã¿ã®ã‚¿ãƒã ã£ãŸã€€å“ä¸è¶³ã¯ã€€è§£æ¶ˆã•ã‚ŒãŸï¼ ã€€å¿ƒã‚†ãã¾ã§ã€€è²·ã„ç‰©ã‚’æ¥½ã—ã¿ã€€æ™‚é–“ã‚’å¿˜ã‚Œã¦éŠã³ ã€€ã‚†ã£ãã‚Šã¨èº«ä½“ã‚’ã€€ä¼‘ã‚ã¦ã„ããŸã¾ãˆã€‚

246419.en:
Yes, yes, yes, yes. Don't you want a
Farazard souvenir? We have a variety
of children's toys.

246420.en:
Hiccup, yummy love! I can't get enough of a drink after a hard day's work. Another one, girl! What are you, a
tourist? Farazard's wine is the best.

246421.en:
It feels good to sing in a plaza, doesn't it? Come to Farazard, a good place, come once, come once, come to
bazaar for shopping, but beware of pickpockets and looters.

246422.en:
The price of jewelry is back to normal! Finally, I can make a new Accessory. Oh, all the stones are so
beautiful, it's hard to decide which one to choose!

246423.en:
My day job is patrolling commercial areas! Please make sure to walk on well-lit streets. Do not be caught in
alleyways! Especially these days, the Shish Kebab gang is going in and out, so be careful! By the way, did I hear
a suspicious-looking guy enter the alleyway just now?

246424.en:
The trader brought in a lot of medicinal herbs. It was a good thing that we had enough medicine to give to
the feverish children in the sanatorium.

246425.en:
You saved my life this time, but it could happen again. At the very least, we should take precautions against
slobs. Maybe I should set traps around the store. Oh, our customers will get caught in them too. Hmmm. Well, for
now.

246426.en:
Well, I'm glad to see that business is back in full swing!The usual energy has returned, and it's all back to the
original bazaar. Thanks a lot. I love this place. Bazaar not only enriches people's lives, but also makes them
smile. Let's see...
246426.ja:
ã€Œã„ã‚„ï½ã€€å•†å£²ãŒå†é–‹ã§ãã¦ã€€ä½•ã‚ˆã‚Šã ãï¼ ã€€ã„ã¤ã‚‚ã®æ´»æ°—ãŒã€€æˆ»ã£ã¦ãã¦ ã€€ã™ã£ã‹ã‚Šã€€å…ƒã®ãƒã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã ã‚ˆã€‚ã‚ã‚“ãŒã¨ãªãã€‚

246427.en:
Welcome, servant~! I wasn't ! Thanks for helping bazaarl! Thanks to you, everyone is
smiling! You can come visit us anytime! You can come visit us anytime! I'll switch to shopkeeper
mode.

246428.en:
Oh, welcome back, little guy! Thanks to you, the store is back in business. Thanks to you, the shop is back in
business. You're still working for Yushka, right? You can't fight a war with less guts. Eat my cooking!
246428.ja:
ã€ŒãŠã†ã€€ã‚ˆãæ¥ãŸãªã€€ã¡ã£ã“ã„ã®ï¼ ã€€ãŠå‰ã®ãŠã‹ã’ã§ã€€åº—ãŒå†é–‹ã§ããŸã€‚ ã€€ç¤¼ã‚’è¨€ã†ãœã€€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ãªã€‚

246429.en:
Thanks for visiting. Mr. Jirgamot has informed me to call you by your name. I will never forget the
name of my benefactor, and I am at your service . Good day to you.

246430.en:
Yurayura. I may look like this, but I am a stimulating masseuse. You can choose the level of numbness from weak
to strong. The weakest is a subtle touch that sends you to paradise.The strongest one is a very serious one
and will send you to the paradise. The customer is the benefactor who saved bazaar. Next time you get tired of
adventures, I will entertain you with the strongest and stiffest.

246431.en:
Did you pick up the Challenge Letter?I see. I knew it. There was a bandit behind all this. I don't know if I can
help you, but I'll call the military. You go to the backstreet hideout.
246431.ja:
ã€Œè¬ã®æœãŸã—çŠ¶ã‚’ã€€æ‹¾ã£ãŸï¼Ÿ ã€€â€¦â€¦ãªã‚‹ã»ã©ã€€ã‚„ã£ã±ã‚Šã€€ãã†ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã­ã€‚ ã€€ä»Šå›ã®ä»¶ã«ã¯ã€€é»’å¹•ã®è³ŠãŒã„ãŸã‚“ã ã‚ã€‚
ã€Œé ¼ã‚Šã«ãªã‚‹ã‹ã€€ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ãªã„ã‘ã© ã€€è»ã«ã¯ã€€ç§ã‹ã‚‰ã€€é€šå ±ã—ã¦ãŠã„ã¦ã‚ã’ã‚‹ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ãªãŸã¯ã€€è£é€šã‚Šã®ã‚¢ã‚¸ãƒˆã¸ã€€è¡Œã£ã¦ã¿ã¦ã€‚

246432.en:
I heard from Mr. Nazine! I heard that the Shish Kebab clan, which caused chaos in the bazaar, has been dealt a
crushing blow. Farazard's army will hunt down the leader of the Shish Kebab group and its members. Please
let us keep the letter as a clue in the search for the members of the Kebab clan.

246433.en:
Oops. I see you are not available at
the moment. Well, when you're ready,
we'll call you again!

246434.en:
Quickly. Please enter the castle!
Mister Nazine is waiting for you in
the throne room.

246435.en:
Farazard's army will hunt down the leader of the Shish Kebab clan and its members, so leave the rest to us.
Quickly. Please go into the castle! Master Nazine is waiting for you in the throne room.

246436.en:
Oh, no, you! Please, come here so we
can talk!

246437.en:
Hello Hey, lady! Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good news.Hello , can you come by, miss? Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good
news.

246438.en:
The Demon King of Farazard has one indispensable asset: his second-in- command, Nazine. When the Demon King
is not available, he is deputized. Most of the time, Nazine handles the more complicated cases that don't get
publicity behind the scenes. It's like the Demon King's shadow! Just like the Demon King's shadow. By the way, he's
a gekko...he gets sleepy after just one drink. He has a surprisingly cute weakness in his face.
246438.ja:
ã€Œãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®é­”ç‹ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã€€æ¬ ã‹ã›ãªã„å­˜åœ¨ ã€€ãã‚ŒãŒã€€å‰¯å®˜ã®ãƒŠã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ§˜ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€é­”ç‹æ§˜ãŒä¸åœ¨ã®æ™‚ã¯ã€€ä»£ç†ã‚’å‹™ã‚ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ã€‚

246439.en:
My day job is patrolling commercial areas! Please make sure to walk on well-lit streets. Do not be caught in
alleyways! Shish Kebab has been exterminated, but there are many more monsters out there. Don't wander
around like a tourist!

246440.en:
Wow, you defeated the Shish Kebab
group? You're not as good as you look,
traveler.

246441.en:
Would you like to give Holten a
Challenge Letter?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

246443.en:
So it was the Shish Kebab group that was behind the whole thing. They are a little different from ordinary
thieves. There are some thieves among the alleyway residents, but they are the people of Farazard who made a
contract with the Demon King. But Shish Kebab rebelled against the Demon King and have a strong hatred for
Farazard. They will be defeated sooner or later.

246444.en:
If you want to take the boat, be my
guest! You can go to the alleyway, but
be prepared to get off there.

246445.en:
Well, well, well <pc>!
Whisper it. Into the castle, please!

246446.en:
Nihihi! Welcome. How are you doing? Are you cursed? I gave Yushka the Evil Sealing Lamp. You can use it for bad
things or for bad things, depending on the Demon King's mood! Hee hee hee!

246447.en:
Dear Yushka, I'm glad you're back safe and sound. I heard that you were the one who was babysitting me. Good job.
Seriously, thank you.

246448.en:
Oh, you mean Mr. Yushka?Of course, I knew he was the Demon King, and I let him stay. He's one of our regulars. He
often goes down to Castle Town to stretch his wings. I like it that way. I'm sure Mr. Nazine is having a hard
time. Well...
246448.ja:
ã€Œãˆã€€ãƒ¦ã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚«æ§˜ã®ã“ã¨ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã‚‚ã¡ã‚ã‚“ã€€é­”ç‹ã ã£ã¦çŸ¥ã£ã¦ã¦ã€€æ³Šã‚ãŸã•ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã®æ–¹ã¯ã€€ã†ã¡ã®å¸¸é€£ãªã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œã‚ˆãã€€åŸä¸‹ç”ºã«ä¸‹ã‚Šã¦ã¯ã€€ç¾½ã‚’ä¼¸ã°ã™ã‚“ã ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚ã„ã†ã€€ã‚†ã‚‹ã„æ‰€ã€€ä¿ºã¯å¥½ãã ãœã€‚ ã€€ãƒŠã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ§˜ã¯ã€€è‹¦åŠ´ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã ã‚ã†ã‘ã©ã€‚ã•ã¦â€¦â€¦

246449.en:
Well, it looks like you found out. Yes. Kunai may have believed it, but that Yushka is the Demon King who
rules this country. However, since he's such a smooth operator, he's more like a leader than a Demon King, and
everyone loves him. Nazine and I are always being pushed around. And you, the Demon King's servant. We seem to
get along well with each other as hard workers.

246450.en:
Welcome to Farazard Jewelry Shop. Here, we do everything from ore selection to processing into jewelry
and ornaments. I have a relationship with Yushka from my days as a jeweler. That's why I'm in charge of the store
now. I am a first-rate jeweler, and I will provide you with accessoris of such high quality that Yushka will not
be able to complain.

246451.en:
Actually, Mr. Jirgamot is a triplet, and he has another sister, Mapricot Neshalot, who has a very similar face.
Neshalot, the sorceress in the family, is always causing trouble. I wish Mr. Jirgamot would take care of him.

246452.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most free and vibrant desert fortress in the Demon World. Yushka left Castle
Town long ago and headed north. Shouldn't we go after him as soon as possible?

246453.en:
It feels good to sing in the plaza.
Let's sing a song.

246454.en:
Hello Hey, lady! Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good news.Hello , can you come by, miss? Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good
news.

246455.en:
Yushka is friendly and approachable, but what makes her so appealing is her ability to recognize the value of
things and her amazing energy! When he found an oasis in the devastated Zard Ruins, he gathered demons, put them in
the right roles, and in no time at all, he had built a nation. By the way, when he gets drunk, he always
takes off his clothes. I can only imagine what Nazine-sama is going through.

246456.en:
Yushka-sama, you were wearing a serious outfit, weren't you? It looks like it could go well, doesn't it? I
seriously hope he becomes the Great Demon King.

246457.en:
You're going to Demon Mountain.Please do not be lazy in your preparations. Get everything you need at the bazaar.
Take care of Yushka. I'm sure you guys will be able to get through the trial.

246458.en:
Hot crab, hot crab. Hot crabs, hot crabs, crabs that seem to be getting chilled right down to the tips of
their scissors. Drake Slime, who was here the other day, boasted that he was the chief of the Farazard Suicide
Squadron.
246458.ja:

246459.en:
Long before Farazard was built, this area was a thriving historic shipping town, but it was destroyed in the war.
The ruined town was settled by thieves, but when Farazard was built, most of the thieves were wiped out by
our Demon King. The Shish Kebab, a group of surviving thieves, have been trying to get revenge on the Demon
King, but recently they have become our allies.

246460.en:
I heard that Yushka even seduced Shish Kebab and made him her companion. He is always so greedy. He never lets go
of anything he finds of value. It must be hard for you, too, Fushushimobe. Keep supporting Yushka. I'm sure you
guys will get through this.

246461.en: Hello Hey, lady! Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good news. Yushka Information Nazine Information Jirgamot Information Quit

246464.en:
Although Farazard is surrounded by desert, it has rich plantations that have been cultivated to take advantage
of the oasis. There is another farm behind Dinga Trade Post. They use mountain spring water to grow root
vegetables and stuff like that.
246464.ja:
ã€Œç ‚æ¼ ã«å›²ã¾ã‚Œã¦ã‚‹ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã ãŒ ã€€ã‚ªã‚¢ã‚·ã‚¹ã‚’æ´»ã‹ã—ã¦ã€€é–‹æ‹“ã—ãŸ ã€€è±Šã‹ãªè¾²åœ’ã‚’ã€€æŒã£ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãœã„ã€‚
ã€Œãƒ‡ã‚£ãƒ³ã‚¬äº¤æ˜“æ‰€ã®å¥¥ã«ã‚‚ã€€è¾²åœ’ãŒã‚ã‚‹ãœã„ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ãã“ã¯ã€€å±±ã®æ¹§ãæ°´ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¦ ã€€æ ¹èœãªã‚“ã‹ã‚’ã€€æ ½åŸ¹ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ãœã„ã€‚

246465.en:
I don't want to say it out loud, but the army asked us carpenters and craftsmen to gather a lot of iron and
sandbags. It's just like preparing for war, isn't it?If we're going to go up against the mighty Valdistas and
Zechres, we'd better be good.
246465.ja:
ã€Œå¤§ããªå£°ã˜ã‚ƒã€€è¨€ãˆãªã„ãŒâ€¦â€¦ ã€€è»ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ä¿ºãŸã¡å¤§å·¥ã‚„è·äººã«ã€€ãŸãã•ã‚“ã®é‰„æã‚„ ã€€åœŸã®ã†ã‚’é›†ã‚ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã¨ã€€ä¾é ¼ãŒã‚ã£ãŸã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œã„ã‹ã«ã‚‚ã€€æˆ¦ã®æº–å‚™ã£ã¦ã€€æ„Ÿã˜ã ã‚ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã‚ã®ã€€å¼·å›½ãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚„ã€€ã‚¼ã‚¯ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã¨ ã€€ã‚„ã‚Šåˆã†ã£ã¦ã‚“ãªã‚‰â€¦â€¦â€¦â€¦ã‚¦ãƒ‡ãŒé³´ã‚‹ãœã€‚

246466.en:
I had a relationship with Yushka from my days as a jeweler. I am now in charge of the store because of that
relationship. Even if you are no longer Yushka's servant, I am a merchant who cherishes our
relationship. Please come visit me without hesitation.

246467.en:
Mmmm ! I have been instructed by Lord Nazine not to let you pass through the castle. Please
leave us! Master Yushka is a merciful man who cares about a simple soldier like me. I cannot believe that I would
betray him!

246468.en:
Yushka is a kind person. She takes good care of children, even Farazard's treasure! Nazine is just as kind.
Nazine is just as kind, and when I greet him cheerfully, he pats me on the head!

246469.en:
Nihihi! Welcome. How are you doing? Are you cursed? I heard you quit being Yushka's servant. Then become my
servant instead! I'll give you the best treatment and use you as my servant. First of all, you'll have to
supply me with living blood every morning.I'll even have you experiment with new magic tricks... My dreams are
getting bigger and bigger! Nihihihihihi!

246470.en:
When will Master Yushka become the Great Demon King? I want to do business with other countries more
freely than I do now. I hope he will be able to settle the Demon World as soon as possible.

246471.en:
Ha! Phew! Ho! My passionate dance! Please watch me until you're bored out of your mind! Yushka-sama Great Demon
King inauguration prayer dance! Oh, yes~! Hassle, Hassle!

246472.en:
I don't know about you, but I heard you quit being a servant of Lord Yushka. What a bad guy. He looked as
if he was rusty after his fight with Lady Nazine. He looks so fragile.
246472.ja:
ã€Œäº‹æƒ…ã¯ã€€ã‚ˆãçŸ¥ã‚‰ãªã„ã‘ã©ã€€ã‚ã‚“ãŸ ã€€ãƒ¦ã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚«æ§˜ã®ã—ã‚‚ã¹ã‚’ã€€ã‚„ã‚ãŸã‚“ã ã£ã¦ï¼Ÿ ã€€æ‚ªã„ãƒ¤ãƒ„ã ãªã‚ã€‚
ã€Œã‚ã®äººã€€ã¾ã‚‹ã§ã€€ãƒŠã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ®¿ã¨ ã€€ã‚±ãƒ³ã‚«ã—ãŸå¾Œã¿ãŸã„ã«ã€€ã•ã³ã—ãã†ã ã£ãŸãœã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã‚è¦‹ãˆã¦ã€€ã‚­ã‚ºã¤ãã‚„ã™ã„ã‚“ã ã‹ã‚‰ã•ï½ã€‚

246473.en:
Since Yushka's return, there has been a flurry of activity in the Farazard army. They seem to be preparing for
something in a hurry. If they don't have enough security in Castle Town, there will be even more thieves. I'll
have to make sure to keep an eye on things!
246473.ja:
ã€Œãƒ¦ã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚«æ§˜ãŒã€€å¸°ã£ã¦ãã¦ã‹ã‚‰ ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰è»ã®å‹•ããŒã€€ã‚ã‚ãŸã ã—ã„ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€æ€¥ã„ã§ã€€ä½•ã‹ã®æº–å‚™ã‚’ã—ã¦ã‚‹ã¿ãŸã„ãªã‚“ã ã€‚
ã€Œã‚‚ã—ã€€åŸä¸‹ç”ºã®è­¦å‚™ãŒã€€æ‰‹è–„ã«ãªã£ãŸã‚‰ ã€€ä»Šä»¥ä¸Šã«ã€€ãƒ‰ãƒ­ãƒœã‚¦ã‚‚å¢—ãˆãã†ã ã€‚ ã€€ä¿ºãŒã€€ã—ã£ã‹ã‚Šã€€è¦‹å›ã‚Šã—ã¦ã‚„ã‚“ãªãã‚ƒãªï¼

246474.en:
I can't say it out loud, but I hear that preparations for war have been steadily underway since Yushka's
return. If war is really going to break out, our clinic needs to be ready to receive the injured. We will
be very busy.

246475.en:
I heard that Yushka even seduced Shish Kebab and made him her companion. He is always so greedy. He's always
greedy, and when he finds something of value, he has to have it, and he never lets it go. You are no exception. Once
two people share life and destiny in a blood contract, their paths will cross again somewhere along the way. So, I
hope you will continue to patronize Farazard's bazaar. I'm always open to business deals.

247433.en:
This is Sand City Farazard, the most
free and vibrant desert nocturnal
castle in the Demon World.

248276.en:
Yes, it was a great success. Don't
enlist, just get some rest. I'll
always be here.

248277.en:
I see. In a little while, a troop of traders from Dinga Trade Post will be arriving. Let's welcome them together.
Hey, Mr. Servant. This is my hunch as the head of the company, but I don't think everything is settled. The
monsters that attacked the traders are a recent migration from the Valdistas. They don't know the desert like we do,
and it's just a coincidence that they took over a key trading post and exploited a weakness in Farazard. Is
it too much to hope that someone else, someone who knows the country better, put the monsters in touch?
248277.ja:

248288.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Too bad.We look forward to seeing you
again!

248289.en:
Wow, I'm so happy! I'm asking for a favor regarding a new letterhead I'm about to launch here at the Post
Office.Sand City Farazard is the city that never sleeps, where the desire of monsters roils! It is the commercial
capital of the Demon World.So I thought that if I made an original Farazard stationery that could be used
for trading, it would sell like hotcakes. I already have a design in mind, but I'm missing a few materials
to complete the design. Do you know a stone called Rich Citrine? It shines richly like a pile of gold coins, and
I need its brilliance for this stationery! The stone can be found in Jyarimbaha Desert and other places,
and sometimes you can get it by defeating <%seV_QUE_NAME0> monster. Could you please go and get Rich
Citrine somehow? Of course, I'll give you a chance to give you the finished letter!

248290.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Really? I'm so happy!I'm so happy!
Then, I'll be waiting for it with
pleasure!

248291.en:
Really? I did it!What is it? Are you sure you're not taking on too many jobs?That's no good! You're too
busy.I'll be waiting for you, so don't worry! Please come back when you are free!

248292.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>Hmmm, too bad.Please come back if you
change your mind!

248294.en:
Thank you very much!And, sir, don't
forget your promise to get Rich
Citrine.<open_irai><bw_break>

248295.en:
Rich Citrine can be obtained by
defeating <%sev_que_name0> monster in
Jyarimbaha Desert!

248296.en:
Would you like to give Rich Citrine to
Paper Shop Matsurika?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

248297.en:
<pc> gave Rich Citrine to
Paper Shop Matsurika!

248298.en:
Ah, you have a visitor!Did you bring
what I asked for by any chance?

248299.en:
Well then, I guess I'll have to buy
some letter paper.Let's see...<bw_break>

248300.en:
Thank you so much! What a rich shine! I can see a pile of gold coins beyond the sparkle. I'm going to use this
stone to complete my new letter paper right away!

248301.en:
Phew! It's amazing! It's a masterpiece!Here you go, Sand City Farazard's limited edition local
stationery!

248302.en:
I used Rich Citrine's colors to express Farazard Castle, which shines brightly at night without losing its
heat! I'm proud of my work! In the Demon World, it is customary for a feathered female demon like myself to
be in charge of the Paper Shop. It is an old and traditional family. If the business is prosperous in Farazard, we
should be able to sell a lot of letter paper, and if that happens, our family's reputation will grow. If all
goes well, he could become the head of the Paper Shop family at a very young age. What a bright future! I'm on
fire! I'm going to work hard at the Paper Shop from now on! Sand City Paper will be sold exclusively at the
Post Office as soon as possible! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

248303.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Thank you very much!By the way, you
have a visitor. I know this is sudden,
but could you do me a favor?<yesno><break>

248383.en:
Well, well, well ! Are you going to Zard Spire? When you exit the Jyarimbaha Desert, there is an
entrance to the ruins on the eastern rock face. You can climb up to Zard Spire from there.

248384.en:
Well, well, well ! Are you going to sleep today? Please make yourselves at home. Do you remember
where you are? My sister Uten is standing in front of your room!
248384.ja:

249795.en:
What's that? You're the courier for the Red Wolves?I thought Lugban was coming. I see. You've been hired as a
deputy.You don't know much about the Red Wolves, do you? The Red Wolf Clan is a private unit that works as the
hands and feet of the great LeDuolf, who owns the gem mines all over the Demon World. The ores of the Demon
World have different magical properties depending on where they are produced, so the more mines you own in
different places, the more lucrative your business will be. In this day and age, LeDiouf is a very powerful man
who is doing business across the country. Anyway, he is a very powerful man. So, a while ago, I received a
letter and payment from LeDiulph asking me to buy a certain necklace from Farazard Jewelry Shop. What he
paid me was three times the regular price! As expected of LeDiouf, he is very generous. I gave him my word. And
so, here it is! This is the necklace. Please take good care of it.

249797.en:
Well, whatever you do, don't open the package. Never, never, never look inside. Okay? Because it's an
important item for an important customer, of course. Make sure you deliver it properly to Batan!
249797.ja:

249798.en:
Do not open the Necklace Package. Never, never, never look inside. Is that okay? Because it's an important
item for an important customer. Make sure you deliver it to Batan properly!

249799.en:
Hey, guys. What's up? Did you find some change in a hare? Oh, you're the courier for the Red Wolves. I've been
waiting for you. I've been waiting for that dangerous gem from the army to hand over to LeDiulph. I don't know
how that jewel got mixed up, but it was casually used to decorate the spear that was delivered to the
castle's armory. It's a good thing that my astute deputy found it, but if I had worn it without knowing it, I
would have been in serious trouble~. I heard they're mining this in Valdista, but I don't think the workers are
safe. To be honest, just holding it like this gives me a shiver down my spine. So, why don't you just take it
and go?

249801.en:
Whew. That's a weight off my shoulders. I've wrapped it up so tightly, don't open it. Well then,
take it to Batan.

249802.en:
I don't know how that jewel got mixed in, but it was casually used to decorate the spear that was delivered
to the castle armory. It's a good thing that my astute deputy found it, but it would have been a real problem
if I had worn it without knowing it~. Now my shoulders are relieved. I've wrapped it up tightly, so don't open
it. Well then, please deliver it to Batan.

249803.en:
Nihihi! We specialize in witchcraft.Who do you want to curse? Who would you like to ruin? How about
your heart for the price? I'm sorry? A courier for the Red Wolf clan? That's quite a dangerous job you've got
yourself into, isn't it?I'll tell you what you're carrying right now. It's a demon miasma stone! The minerals of
Demon World are bound to demon miasma that emerges from the depths of the earth during the crystallization
process. This is the source of the magic that resides in the gem. The demon miasma stone contains an excess
of demon miasma.The demon miasma stone contains an excessive amount of demon miasma, and when used with this stone,
it can provide tremendous magical power. Yes, if you are an advanced demon. If an unresistant demon touches
it by mistake, it will be affected by demon miasma, lose its ego, and turn into a ferocious hexenbiest! There is
even a record of a war that broke out and destroyed a country because of a demon miasma stone that was
inadvertently received by an ordinary demon. That's why our Demon King has entrusted LeDiulf with the task of
retrieving the demon miasma stone to prevent it from being misused. I heard that he is also an expert in
witchcraft, and can control the art of sealing the demon miasma stone. I'm sorry, but he's better than me. Come
on, come on, come on, come on, come on! You've been itching to get your hands on a demon miasma stone, haven't
you? But I'm sorry to hear that. The Ruff Ruffian's errand boy who just came in just now took it. I was in a
hurry, so I gave it to him in a flash. Maybe we should chase after him sooner, huh? Hee hee!

249805.en:
Oh, no, that's too bad. The Ruff Ruffian's assistant who came just a few minutes ago took the item. I was
in a hurry, so I gave it to him in a flash. Maybe I should chase after him sooner, huh? Hee hee!

249806.en:
I heard that LeDiulph is also an expert in witchcraft and can control demon miasma, the art of sealing
stones. I'm sorry, but he's better than me. The Magicloth that we wrap the demon miasma stone in came from
LeDiulf. But I was in a hurry at the time. I knew it was going to be a problem, right, Mr. Pasiri-kun? Hee
hee hee! I hear you have a pretty bad headache. Sometimes in Valdista, there are accidents where workers who touch
the demon miasma stones with their bare hands go berserk. Our Demon King is smart enough to collect them.

250240.en:
The Valdista army that had crossed the desert attacked us, but after a while they turned back in a hurry. Thanks to
this, there was no major damage, but there may still be hidden soldiers lurking in the desert. We will remain
vigilant.
250240.ja:
ã€Œç ‚æ¼ ã‚’è¶Šãˆã¦ããŸã€€ãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿è»ãŒ ã€€æ”»æ’ƒã‚’ä»•æ›ã‘ã¦ããŸãŒã€€ã—ã°ã‚‰ãã™ã‚‹ã¨ ã€€æ…ŒãŸã ã—ã„æ§˜å­ã§ã€€å¼•ãè¿”ã—ã¦ã„ã£ãŸã€‚

250241.en:
Good to see you . The attack by the Valdista army has subsided, and the bazaar and everyone
is safe.

250242.en:
Finally, Yushka's plans take a major turn. I'm so sorry for the maiden of miasma and you who got caught up in
this. I'm sorry. It's hard to ask for more help, but please help Yushka if you can. This war is making me nervous
too.

250243.en:
When Valdista's army came at me with blood in their eyes, I thought it was over. Demon Queen Valeria is a horror!
If our Yushka-sama becomes the Great Demon King, we will have a rich Demon World, so why are we going to war?

250244.en:
The Valdistas were caught in an unfamiliar sandy terrain, and an unexpected sand storm made it
difficult for them to march forward. The wise Master Yushka had deliberately lured them away from
Farazard, thinking that they would not cause too much damage.
250244.ja:
ã€Œãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿è»ã¯ã€€æ…£ã‚Œãªã„ç ‚åœ°ã«è¶³ã‚’ã¨ã‚‰ã‚Œ ã€€æ€ã„ãŒã‘ãªã„ã€€ç ‚åµã«ã‚‚ã‚ã£ã¦ ã€€ãã†ã¨ã†ã€€é€²è»ã«è‹¦åŠ´ã—ãŸã‚ˆã†ã ã€‚

250245.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Welcome <pc>! Kunai ze, I
want you, my benefactor, to die. I
hope you are prepared for it here!<bw_break>

250246.en:
Don't worry about shortage.We have learned from our past mistakes and increased our stockpile. We are
prepared for the Great War and have no worries. Now then...

250247.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Mohabi, Farazard's chief cookout
master, will be wielding his pride and
joy! Eat well and support Mr. Yushka!<bw_break>

250248.en:
The new sword that Yushka-sama was holding had an unusual glow to it. I wonder what kind of material he used
to make it. Oops. Well, is there anything else you need?

250249.en:
No wonder Valdista had such a hard time marching across the desert in that full body armor. It saved our
asses, though. Well. It's times like this when we have to put our backs into it. Business, business, business!

250250.en:
The Farazard suicide attack force, the Shish Kebab, was in hot pursuit of the Valdistas as they pulled out of the
desert. You never know what the world will bring to those who until recently were tormenting the bazaar, to become
such dependable allies.

250251.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>It feels good to sing at the
Oasis.Now, let's sing a song.

250252.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>I want only one souvenir: the head of
Demon Queen Valeria.

250253.en:
Ha! Phew! Ho!My passionate dance! Please watch me until you're bored out of your mind! Yushka-sama, the dance
of victory prayer! Oh, yes~! Hassle, Hassle!

250254.en:
Yurayura. I may look like this, but I am a stimulating masseuse. Sometimes I help the Farazard Army. I gently
cuddle up to lazy soldiers and numb them with my strongest touch. I can magically make your spine shiver.

250255.en:
Ha !I have received instructions from Lord Nazine that you are free to pass through the castle. I
see you have made peace with Master Yushka! Let's continue to support him together! Valdia Mountain Region,
beyond the western barrier of Gerhena Field, is the battlefield! Please have good luck!

250256.en:
Yushka-sama, who left Farazard, was equipped with a very cool sword. Is that what you call serious mode? It
looks like it could be badass, right? I think I can defeat Demon Queen Valeria, don't you?

250257.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Hiccup, yummy love! I can't get enough
of a drink after a hard day's work.
Another one, onee-chan!

250258.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>War? If you put it that way, there was
a lot of noise just now. Were they
having fireworks?

250259.en:
Right now, Master Yushka is risking his life fighting the Valdista army. For Farazard. I want to help Yushka-
sama too. I want to protect Farazard with my own hands. Leave it to me to patrol Castle Town!
250259.ja:
ã€Œä»Šé ƒã€€ãƒ¦ã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚«æ§˜ã¯ã€€å‘½ãŒã‘ã§ ã€€ãƒãƒ«ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚¿è»ã¨ã€€æˆ¦ã£ã¦ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã‚ˆãªã€‚ ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®ãŸã‚ã«â€¦â€¦ã€‚
ã€Œä¿ºã‚‚ã€€ãƒ¦ã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚«æ§˜ã®ã€€æ‰‹ä¼ã„ãŒã—ãŸã„ã€‚ ã€€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ã€€è‡ªåˆ†ã®æ‰‹ã§ã€€å®ˆã‚‹ã‚“ã ã€‚ ã€€åŸä¸‹ç”ºã®è¦‹å›ã‚Šã¯ã€€ã¾ã‹ã›ã¦ãã‚Œï¼

250260.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>It's a magic shop. Neshalot, the
owner, was complaining about Necrodea.

250261.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>The game has changed, just as Yushka
planned. Now all we have to do is kick
Valdista's ass as he runs away!

250262.en:
I can't tell you the details, but the Demon King has ordered us to build a magnificent building in a secret
location. I've been working long and hard on it. I won't let the enemy ruin it. Yushka-sama, please make sure you
win!

250263.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>If we can hold our ground, Yushka will
be able to fight with peace of mind.
We will all protect Farazard!

250264.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Maou-sama works hard and fights for
everyone. That's why Myha ko Kunai!

250265.en:
I'm so pissed off! What do you want from me? I'm in a bit of a bad mood right now! I sealed up Necrodea's
barrier in Gerhena Field with a spell, but someone broke through it!
250265.ja:
ã€Œãƒ ã‚­ãƒ¼ãƒƒï¼ã€€ãƒœã‚¯ã«ã€€ãªã‚“ã‹ç”¨ï¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ä»Šã€€ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨ã€€æ©Ÿå«Œæ‚ªã„ã‚“ã ã‘ã©ï¼

250266.en:
You are the one who broke the seal! And with a little help from a scroll I got from The Oracle? There aren't many
people in the whole of Demon World who can break my spell! Who the hell is The Oracle?

250267.en:
My day job is patrolling commercial areas! There may be enemy spies in the area. If you see anything suspicious,
report it immediately!

250268.en:
When I was about to go out to deliver the mail, I saw Valdista Soldiers in full armor walking around, and I was
scared. I'm sure if they caught me, they would strip me of my fur and turn me into a bedroll!

250269.en:
I have been assigned by Yushka to operate the Abyss Gate in this area and close it in case of emergency. I
can't let the enemy get in. Once the war is over, the Abyss Gates around the Demon World will be opened again.
We have already lifted restrictions on Abyss Gates in Farazard and Jyarimbaha Desert, so you should be able to use
them as conveniently as ever.
250269.ja:

250270.en:
I am sure that on the battlefields of Valdista, the gems we have polished are being used as swords and spears by
the soldiers!

250271.en:
My husband is a soldier in Farazard and he went to the battlefield with Master Yushka. I want him to kill as
many of the enemy as possible!

250272.en:
The returning soldiers were all pale. I heard that Zechres, with whom we had been cooperating, has summoned a
terrible demon. It is good that Yushka-sama returned safely, but to lose his second-in-command, Nazine-
dono. I am at a loss for words.

250273.en:
I heard about Nazine. He always thought If he could save Yushka with his own life, it would be cheap. I had
prepared myself for the possibility that one day this day might come, but when the time comes, it's still hard,
isn't it?

250274.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>You are not like Nazine. Please
cherish your life and rest your body
and mind well.

250275.en:
We were supposed to be fighting Valdista's army, but Zechres betrayed us and attacked Farazard's army along
with Valdista's! What a bunch of traitors!Breach of contract means death! That's even written in the
terms and conditions of my store.

250276.en:
Many soldiers returning from the battlefield are being brought to my clinic one after another, injured by
the tremendous destructive rays. I will do my best to treat them with all the medicinal herbs I can find. There
are still lives to be saved.

250277.en:
Master Yushka was carried to the castle by Captain Shish Kebab. He didn't even have the strength to walk.
Nazine-dono was Yushka-sama's old best friend, second-in-command, and emotional support. Oh, what a pity.

250278.en:
La la la la~ Farazard's second-in- command Nazine Demon of love and loyalty who defended the Demon King
Let's give praise to him in the past

250279.en:
Ha! Phew! Ho!My passionate dance! Please watch me until you are bored out of your mind! Yushka-sama, the
dance of energy! Oh, yes~! Hassle, Hassle!

250280.en:
Yurayura. I may look like this, but I am a stimulating masseuse. Sometimes I help the Farazard Army. Yushka, you
look terrible. I want to cheer you up. I'll give you the best touch.

250281.en:
Welcome back . Master Yushka has returned to the castle accompanied by Captain Shish Kebab.
Did that Nazin-dono really lose his life?

250282.en:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Ugh. Ugh. I'm sorry for keeping you
waiting. Please enter the castle!

250283.en:
It's really hard to deal with Mr. Nazine.I was a thug, and he was trying to blackmail me to live for my
country. Even I'm depressed like this, but it must be even harder for Yushka- sama. No, seriously, I'm worried.
250283.ja:
ã€ŒãƒŠã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ®¿ã®ä»¶ã€€ãƒã‚¸ã§ã€€ã‚­ãƒ„ã„ã‚ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã®äººã¯ã€€ãƒãƒ³ãƒ”ãƒ©ã ã£ãŸä¿ºã«ã€€å›½ã®ãŸã‚ã« ã€€ç”Ÿãã¦ã¿ã‚ã£ã¦ã€€å–ã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã¦ãã‚ŒãŸã‚“ã â€¦â€¦ã€‚

250284.en:
The essential element of the Demon King of Farazard was his second-in- command, Mr. Nazine. Most of the
troublesome cases that didn't get publicity were handled behind the scenes by Mr. Nazine. He was the
shadow of the Demon King! It's like the Demon King's shadow. He sometimes accompanied Mr. Yushka to have drinks
at the tavern. He was a gekko, so he got sleepy pretty quickly. I'll miss seeing the two of you together like
that again.
250284.ja:
ã€Œãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®é­”ç‹ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã€€æ¬ ã‹ã›ãªã„å­˜åœ¨ ã€€ãã‚ŒãŒã€€å‰¯å®˜ã®ãƒŠã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ§˜ã ã£ãŸã®ã€‚

ã€Œâ€¦â€¦ã‚ã‚“ãªã€€ãµãŸã‚Šã®å§¿ãŒã€€äºŒåº¦ã¨ ã€€è¦‹ã‚‰ã‚Œãªã„ãªã‚“ã¦ã€€ã•ã³ã—ã„ã‚ã­ã€‚

250285.en:
I will be a Farazard soldier one day. I will definitely become a man who can protect Yushka at the risk of his life
like Nazine!

250286.en:
Damn. You cowardly Zechres! He's even worse than Valdista! I can't take it anymore. Let them know what they did
to our Yushka!

250287.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>Miss Nagasaki, is she dead? Will you
stop rubbing me?<bw_break>

250289.en:
Nihihihihi! I once asked Nazine the same question at Necrodea 200 years ago. I asked Nazine the same question
200 years ago in Necrodea: ''It is possible to capture the souls of your parents and put them in a temporary
vessel to become a living corpse, but what about you? Nazine didn't do it. Well, what will Yushka say? Will she
give the same answer as you?

250290.en:
Did Farazard lose? Did Zechres win? I'm not sure. The longer the war drags on, the poorer we become. Please,
Yushka, help me and my friends!

250291.en:
It is said that Queen Dowager Elgadora's treasured staff of Meara has tremendous power that could turn
the Demon World upside down. There are also many other magical tools, spells, and other things in their treasury.
The name of the magical country is not a joke.

250292.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>My husband was a soldier in Farazard
and went to war with Master Yushka.<bw_break>

250293.en:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>I told him to kill as many enemies as
possible, but he ran for his life and
came back! He's so worthless.<bw_break>

250294.en:
But when I saw his face, I couldn't help but cry. It's true what they say about the living Famililar than the
dead Demon King.

250295.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>The Shish Kebab guys are running
toward Gerhena Field at a high rate of
speed! What the hell is going on?

250296.en:
So you're going to Zechres. To take down Nazine's killer? Or to save this Demon World? Whatever the reason,
don't die. You're reserved for me. I won't forgive you if you hurt me.

250297.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Have a good day <pc>. I'm
sure you'll get through any trial.

250298.en:
! Shish Kebab, or rather, the Suicide Squad Leader, has just left Farazard with his men. He said he
was going to pry open the gate of Gerhena Field that leads to Belvain Forest.

250315.en:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I believe it is the duty of a bard to
recount the glories of the dead. May
his soul rest in peace.

250370.en:
I can't cook because I can't get the ingredients. I think the restaurant in bazaar is in the same situation. Sorry
about that. Please come again.

250556.en:
<icon_exc>Oh, my God. Did you hear that? The
sound of wheels coming to life.

251492.en:
Welcome! We are ready to take your order! Well, I haven't opened my store yet. I'm sure I'll get permission
soon. We are preparing now. Please wait a moment!

251493.en:
Hey, listen to me! I wanted to open a store in the bazaar, so I asked Jirgamot to do so! He said that if I
made a prototype and thought it would sell, then I could open a store! I thought about it, but it's hot and
thirsty in Farazard, so I thought it would be good to sell cold, sweet drinks. I've learned various drink
recipes from restaurateurs Mohabi and Jamefu, so I'm pretty confident about it. So, I'd like to make some
prototypes, and I was wondering if you could help me out a little. Right? Please!

251494.en:
Yay! Thank you so much! There's a recipe I really want to make, but it was too hard for me to do it by
myself. Let's see... First, I need to gather ingredients. Free-Range Eggs. You can find them at the store or buy
them at the bazaar. I've also asked Mohabi at the restaurant to stock Jyarim Milk, so please ask him. Then,
please help me out!

251495.en:
Yay! Well then, let's get started. It looks like you have a lot of work. Well, I'm sorry, but I'll ask you
another time.

251496.en:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>I see. I guess you are busy right now.
Well then, I'll ask you another time.

251497.en:
First of all, you need to gather ingredients. One is Free-Range Eggs, which you can get at the store or
bazaar.

251498.en:
And Jyarim Milk. Mohabi at the restaurant said he would get this for me. When you have both of them, please
come back soon. Okay, then!

251499.en:
Welcome back! How's it going? Did you
gather the ingredients?

251500.en:
Would you give Free-Range Eggs and
Jyarim Milk to Pashti?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

251501.en:
I see. Well, I'll get ready too, so
come back as soon as you get together!

251502.en:
<pc> gave Pashti Free-Range
Eggs and Jyarim Milk!

251503.en:
Yay! Thanks! I'm ready too. Eggs, Mirik, and sugar. Mix them together and you get a delicious drink called
Mirik Sake. I'm making it for the first time, too. And then there's the most important thing. There is the
most important thing. It's very important to keep this drink very cold. So I was wondering if you could
get some ice for me. I talked to Jamefu at the restaurant the other day, and he said that Gorya at the
Dinga Trade Post in Jyarimbaha Desert sells ice. I know it's a bit far away, but could you ask Gorya to get some
ice for me? Thank you!

251504.en:
Well, well, well... it looks like our
bazaar savior is here to save the day.
What's up, you want something to eat?

251505.en:
<pc> asked Server Mohabi if
the Jyarim Milk that Pashti requested
had been stocked.

251506.en:
Ah, we just got this in a little while ago. But what is it? Now you're running errands for Miss Pashti? Well,
that girl... She's going to be judged by Jirgamot for opening a store in bazaar. Hmmm. Well, I'm going to
support her, but as expected, the road seems to be a tough one. After all, the opponent is that Jirgamot. When I
opened the store, he gave me very strict conditions. This is also a learning experience. I can't wait to
take it to him.

251508.en:
How's it going? Did you get to meet
Gorya? He is at the Dinga Trade Post
in Jyarimbaha Desert.<open_irai><bw_break>

251509.en:
How's it going? Did you get the ice
from Gorya?

251510.en:
Would you give Pashti the Kacrack
Stone?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

251511.en:
I see. We haven't met yet. I know it's a bit far away, so I know it's not easy, but I'm looking forward to
meeting you!

251513.en:
What? Really? Yay! What is that? A stone? It looks like a stone, but it's not ice. Wow! If you put this in
water, it gets cold. Amazing! Then, let's try it right away!

251514.en:
Pashti placed the Kacrack Stone in a
tub of water and began mixing the
ingredients in a large bowl.

251515.en:
According to the recipe, the key is to whip the Mirik Sake until it is fluffy. I wonder what it will taste
like? What is it? Is it some kind of funny Kunai? My hands are getting heavy from mixing it. Ah! The drink!
It's freezing and turning into a hard matcha! No, let's stop, let's stop! Stop!

251516.en:
Oh, no. I've completely hardened matcheda. Maybe I used too much power to cool it down. Well, what should I
do with it? Well, it's too good to waste, so let's try it! Hmm? It's softer than I expected. Well then,
let's eat it.

251517.en:
Oishii! Oh, my God, this is amazing Kunai! It's sweet and soft, and it melts cold in your mouth! I've never
seen food like this in any book! I bet if Jirgamot had one, he'd say it would sell! Hey, take it while it's still
warm!

251519.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Quickly, quickly! Before it melts,
please bring Jirgamot the hardened
Mirik sake you just made!<open_irai><bw_break>

251520.en:
Oh, <pc>, can I help you with
something bazaarl? Or is it for me?

251521.en:
Would you give Pashti's Trial Product
to Jirgamot?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

251522.en:
Oh, you didn't need something? Well, if you're offering to be my servant, I'm always open to that, aren't I?
Hmm.

251524.en:
Jirgamot took a bite of Pashti's Trial
Product.

251525.en:
Well, now you're Pashti's servant? What a joke. Oh yes, you were talking about the screening process for
opening a restaurant. But the place Pashti said she wanted to open was a drink shop, right? Is this cream? I'll
have some anyway.

251526.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hey, hey, how did it go? Did they say
we can open a booth?

251527.en:
<pc> informed Pashti that he
had passed the review.

251528.en:
Really? Really? Yay! We can open a store, right? I'm so happy! I didn't know what was going to happen when I
got solid matcha, but it's so Drang to be able to do something like that! Well then, we have to start preparing
the store right away! We'll have to stock up on materials, so we'll have to consult with the bazaar. Oh, no! I
forgot to thank you. Thank you so much! I'll be serving you after we open, so be sure to come by!
251528.ja:

251529.en:
Various frozen prototype drinks are
laid out on the table.

251530.en:
The product is really wonderful. The cost seems to be that high, and above all, it offers a new experience. It's
rare for me to pass the test at the first try. I usually give advice not only on products, but also on
procurement, negotiations, and many other things. This new product has the kind of impact that blows even those
concerns out of the water. We should take advantage of this momentum and proceed with the opening of the store.
Now, what should we do about the location of the store? A place where people can gather would be nice, but
we don't want to have a line, and I'm not sure where we can eat.

251531.en:
I have to get the store ready right away! I'll have to stock up on materials, so I'll have to consult
with bazaarl about all kinds of things. Thank you so much! I'll be serving you when I open, so be sure to
come by!

251532.en:
Hey, I heard that. Well, that's quite an accomplishment. I didn't think she'd get through the screening
process in one shot. It's frozen, yet soft. I'm not much of a sweets guy, but it sure is a novelty, and it's
going to be popular. I don't know the ins and outs of the business, though, so I'm worried about that. Well...
251532.ja:
ã€Œã‚ˆã†ã€€èã„ãŸãœã€‚ã„ã‚„ãƒ¼ã€€å¤§ã—ãŸã‚‚ã‚“ã ã€‚ ã€€ã‚ã®å¬¢ã¡ã‚ƒã‚“ã€€ã¾ã•ã‹ä¸€ç™ºã§ ã€€å¯©æŸ»ã«é€šã£ã¡ã¾ã†ã¨ã¯ãªã€‚

251543.en:
Hmmm. Mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm. It's wonderful! This pleasure that
melts sweetly in the mouth and keeps cool until it passes through the throat! It's as if an ice dragon is
dancing in splendor. I can see the snowy gold lands beyond this unknown cold pastry! This product is worth it.
I haven't had this feeling in years. It's encounters like this that make business so interesting. You passed!
I'd like you to open a store right away. Tell Pashti I'll arrange a good location for her.

251662.en:
I know it's a bit far, but could you
ask Gorya to sell me some ice? Thank
you!

251663.en:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr><close_irai>I'll try to see if I can make the same
drink with other drinks while I'm at
it!

251685.en:
Me and Levia work at Farazard Jewelry Shop as Accessory Craftsmen. We'd love for you to come in and shop with us.
We were just having tea here. Can I help you with something Levia?

251686.en:
Welcome to Farazard Jewelry Shop. You are in Farazard Jewelry Shop. Are you looking for something? Yes, if you are
looking for Levia, she is indeed an Accessory craftsman who works here. She is an Accessory craftsman who
works in our shop, but she is currently on a break. I believe she is resting at the top of the stairs right
in front of the door behind you. Good bye.

252749.en:
Yushka is friendly and approachable, but what makes her so appealing is her ability to recognize the value of
things and her amazing energy! When he found an oasis in the devastated Zard Ruins, he gathered demons, put them in
the right roles, and in no time at all, he had built a nation. By the way, when he gets drunk, he always
takes off his clothes. I can only imagine what Nazine-sama is going through.

252750.en:
The Demon King of Farazard has one indispensable asset: his second-in- command, Nazine. When the Demon King
is not available, he is deputized. Most of the time, Nazine handles the more complicated cases that don't get
publicity behind the scenes. It's like the Demon King's shadow! Just like the Demon King's shadow. By the way, he's
a gekko...he gets sleepy after just one drink. He has a surprisingly cute weakness in his face.
252750.ja:
ã€Œãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ©ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã®é­”ç‹ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã€€æ¬ ã‹ã›ãªã„å­˜åœ¨ ã€€ãã‚ŒãŒã€€å‰¯å®˜ã®ãƒŠã‚¸ãƒ¼ãƒ³æ§˜ã‚ˆã€‚ ã€€é­”ç‹æ§˜ãŒä¸åœ¨ã®æ™‚ã¯ã€€ä»£ç†ã‚’å‹™ã‚ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚ã€‚
