252751.en:
The Demon King of Farazard grew his country through trade, bringing people and goods together. Sales from the
bazaar are especially important. The man who carries the weight and the trust is Jirgamot, the head of the
gang. He has a beautiful smile, but he's also very clever. By the way, he's a bazaarfly... I think if I tried
to hit on you over drinks, you'd probably go down first.

252963.en:
Would you tell Item Shop Sonoran that
Crocco asked you to sell him a smeared
pomegranate?<yesno><close>

252964.en:
You are indeed very discerning to be looking for a pomegranate covered in dust! They're a
luxury item that's hard to come by, but here at Farazard's bazaar, we're proud of it! Of course we have
pomegranates covered in blood! Please pay for it with your ears!

252965.en:
<pc> gave the Small Money Bag
to Item Shop Sonoran and received a
pomegranate covered in dust!

252966.en:
Thank you! It's a little small, but
it's very fresh! Be careful when you
eat them!

253442.en:
I didn't find anything of particular
interest.

253469.en:
If goods are in short supply, prices will rise, and higher prices will lead to greater loss of customers. If this
happens, merchants will go out of business, and that will be the ultimate in sadness. Please help us
together with Mr. Yushka, Servants.

253470.en:
Material Shop Coroled has other things to tell , we'll come back when we've sorted out the bazaar
issues.

253667.en:
Long before Farazard was built, there was a thriving shipping town with a long history in this area, but it was
destroyed in the war. I understand that we have to fight to protect what we need to protect. But I don't like
war.

253668.en:
Yushka is friendly and approachable, but what makes him so appealing is his ability to recognize the value of
things and his amazing energy! When he found an oasis in the devastated Zard Ruins, he gathered demons, put them in
the right roles, and in no time at all, he had built a nation. By the way, when he gets drunk, he always
takes off his clothes.

253669.en:
My day job is patrolling commercial areas!Please make sure to walk on well-lit streets. Do not be a slave to
alleyways! Come to think of it, the Shish Kebab gang is still roosting in a backstreet hideout. Of course, they
have left the thief business behind.

253670.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>I'm glad the war is over! I'm glad the
enemy didn't capture us, strip us of
our fur, and turn us into nabeshiki!

253671.en:
The treasured staff of Meara that Queen Dowager Elgadora possesses is said to have tremendous power that
could turn the Demon World upside down.

253672.en:
What? That Queen Mother Dowager is dead! Wow. It's like history has moved on. I wonder what will happen to
Zechres now?

253673.en:
I have been assigned by Yushka to operate the Abyss Gate in this area and close it in case of emergency. I
don't want the enemy to be able to invade. Now that the war is over, Abyss Gates all over Demon World
should be open again. I've put you through a lot of trouble. I hope you will continue to use Abyss Jewel as
conveniently as before.
253673.ja:
ã€Œåƒ•ã¯ã€€æœ‰äº‹ã®éš›ã«ã€€ã“ã®è¿‘è¾ºã®ã‚¢ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’ ã€€æ“ä½œã—ã¦ã€€æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’é–‰ã–ã™å½¹å‰²ã‚’ ã€€ãƒ¦ã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚«ã‹ã‚‰ã€€ä¸ãˆã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚“ã ã€‚

254494.en:
Although the damage is less severe than in other countries, there is still much work to be done to treat
the injured and restore the trade routes.

254495.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>We will do our best to defend the most
free and vibrant desert fortress in
the Demon World.

254496.en:
I heard about Nazine. He always thought If he could save Yushka with his own life, it would be cheap. I had
prepared myself for the possibility that one day this day might come, but when the time comes, it's still hard,
isn't it?

254497.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Thank you for defeating the Zechres
Fiend. We too must look forward to the
recovery of Farazard and do our best.

254498.en:
Captain Shish Kebab has returned from the battle of Belvain Forest with his men. He looks like he's done with his
life, though he's a bit battered and bruised. It looks like he'll be able to keep his wounds at the Horse
Mackerel on the alleyway for a while. They say it's more comfortable than the guardroom at the castle.

254499.en:
Yurayura. I may look like this, but I am a stimulating masseuse. I'm also useful for the reconstruction of
Farazard. I will gently lean on the tired people and numb them with the strongest touch. Stars will pop out of
your eyes and you will feel refreshed.

254500.en:
Hot crab, hot crab.Crabs that seem to be getting chilled to the tips of their scissors. As long as there is
clean water in Farazard, demons will gather from all over the place and flourish. Don't worry. Crab that can
recover again and again.

254501.en:
Long before Farazard was built, there was a thriving shipping town with a long history in this area, but it was
destroyed in the war. They say that history repeats itself, but it can't be destroyed so easily. Farazard has a
long way to go.

254502.en:
Ha! Phew! Ho!My passionate dance! Please watch me until you are bored out of your mind! Farazard
Reconstruction, the dance of ''We'll all do our best''! Oh, yeah~! Hassle, Hassle!

254503.en:
Welcome back ! I heard that you and Master Yushka defeated the Witch of Zechres! I hope Nazine-
dono is now on the mend. I hope Nazine-dono has been refreshed. We, the survivors, must firmly protect
Farazard from now on.

254504.en:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Hey there. It's a relief to see your
safe face. I'm so relieved to see your
safe and sound face.<bw_break>

254505.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Yeah? Of course you're a Farazard
companion. You had your problems, but
in the end, you saved Yushka's life!

254506.en:
Hiccup, yummy love! I can't get enough of a drink after a hard day's work. Another one, girl! The shortcut to
Farazard's recovery is to eat, drink and spend lots of money. Farazard's wine is the best!

254507.en: Hello Hey, lady! Lalafa-chan, the soft and fluffy sign girl, will give you some good news. Yushka Information Nazine Information Jirgamot info Shish Kebab Information Quit

254508.en:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Who else do you want to hear good news
about?
<select>

254509.en:
After Master Yushka bought Shish Kebab's talent and made him a suicide captain, he is now using his old
experience to take down the ruffians. After work, he brings his men and generously treats them to drinks. It's
so noisy! By the way, he's a crier... He gets annoyed when I keep repeating the same story about how nice Yushka-
sama is.

254510.en:
I heard that you rode into Zechres Castle with Master Yushka and made Bangers out of the demons! Damn! That
felt good! Well, now it's our turn to get our strength back. We craftsmen may be useless in battle, but we're
more than happy to fix what's broken!

254511.en:
Thanks to your efforts, it looks like there won't be a major war for a while. We can work on reconstruction
with peace of mind!

254512.en:
I can't tell you much about it, but Yushka has ordered us to build a magnificent building in a secret
location. We've been working on it for a long time and it's almost finished. I'm glad we didn't get caught up in
the war. I'm looking forward to the day when I can unveil it.

254513.en:
Yushka is a great person. Nazine-sama, it's sad that she died, but she's a good person, so she can't help it. If
Yushka misses you, you should cheer her up.Yushka is a great person. Nazine-sama, it's sad to see you go, but you're a good person, so you don't give up. If
Yushka-sama seems sad, please encourage her.
254513.ja:
